title: League of Legends Championship Viewing Party!!!!!!!!
body:
I invited a bunch of people from my college to watch the Finals at my apartment, and saw it as a perfect excuse to make all sorts of LEAGUE THEMED FOOD AND STUFF!!!!!!
We made Alistar {{champion:12}}  Burgers, with little French Fries Horns & a Zyra {{champion:143}}  Salad with spiky leaves!!!!
Starter Item Cups ({{item:1055}} {{item:1056}} {{item:1054}} {{item:1039}}     & Ward Straws (Your preference of Pink {{item:2043}}  or Green {{item:2044}} !)
Mana{{item:2004}}  & Health{{item:2003}}  Potion Drinks!
BEST OF ALL!!!!!! LULU'S  {{champion:117}} CUPCAKES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Was rooting for SHR, sad they lost. CONGRATS TO SSW, & to MATA FOR MVP!!!!!
Can't wait for Season 5!
Thanks Riot!
#hotdogwin

replies.body:
> THIS IS AWESOME! ^-^

I know Nikasaur is gone, but seriously bring back the Showcase ... find someone who can do it.  I miss seeing this kind of stuff every week.
That's so cool :D League food is a great idea!
cool to see some creative people out there. I'm definitely lacking in the culinary arts lol
